item.title: Verac's Set Effect -critical hit-
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

My bad lol…
But I think i got something…

if (playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4753 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4757 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4759 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4755) { if(misc.random(10) == 1) { stillgfx(383, EnemyY, EnemyX); hitDiff = 60 + misc.random(10); sendMessage("Criticle Hit"); } }

So it’ll say it when you hit a 60 + … thats the cheap way though…

There is probaly some where where you can add…

if (playerHit > 60) { sendMessage("Criticle hit!");

item.title: Verac's Set Effect -critical hit-
item.dc:creator: @red_rooster red_rooster
item.description:
@red_rooster wrote:

alright im trying to make full veracs set effect. this is what i have. (Pvp)

public void verac() {
if(misc.random(10) == 1)
	{
stillgfx(383, EnemyY, EnemyX);
sendMessage("Criticle Hit");
hitDiff = 30 + misc.random(40);
}
}

and this is for (Npc)

if (playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4753 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4757 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4759 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4755) {
if(misc.random(10) == 1)
	{
stillgfx(383, EnemyY, EnemyX);
sendMessage("Criticle Hit");
hitDiff = 50 + misc.random(20);
}
}

the problem is sometimes it says critical hit but u only hit like 23, other times it says critical hit and hits like 60+ i want to make it so every time it crits it hits at least 40.

Read full topic
